summary:
Please leave some feedback so I can decide 
whether or not to make the other weapons in the set!
This contains a retexture of the steel sword - 
it replaces any steel sword with my dark majestic blue
steel and black leather hilt.
descriptionHtml:
[color=\"#000080\"][font=\"Georgia\"][size=\"6\"]Please post a comment so I can decide whether or not to make the rest of the weapons! Thanks![/size][/font][/color]

[color=\"#000080\"][font=\"Georgia\"][size=\"6\"]Dark Blue Steel BETA - Sword[/size][/font][/color]

This only contains a retexture of the steel sword - 
it replaces any steel sword with my dark blue steel
and black leather hilt.
This is currently just to see what people think of this
re-texture. I hope to get some feedback so I can decide 
whether or not to make the other weapons in the set!

[b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b]

Extract or drop the \'texture\' folder I provided into 
your Skyrim/Data folder. You may want to back up
 your steel weapons files if you have them unpacked/
extracted. Just make a new folder in the steel folder,
and name it something like \'Originals\' and copy/paste
all the steel weapon textures into the folder, then 
extract this file.

[b][u]UNINSTALLATION[/u][/b]

Why would you want to do that? Just kidding!

Just delete this file (steelsword.dds) in the path of
\'skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\steel\', and
if you had unpacked the other files and backed 
them up, you could copy the file to the steel folder
 from the \'Originals\' folder, but you don\'t need to -
 it will still work without it being there.

If you didn\'t unpack them, don\'t worry, the path 
will set itself to the correct file.

[color=\"#000080\"][font=\"Georgia\"][size=\"6\"]~~BayHarman~~[/size][/font][/color]
author: BayHarman
